Title: ğŸ‡²ğŸ‡©ğŸ‡ªğŸ‡º Moldovaâ€™s withdrawal from the EU program - Creative Euro...
Description: ğŸ‡²ğŸ‡©ğŸ‡ªğŸ‡º About Moldovaâ€™s withdrawal from the EU program - Creative Europe - Recently it became known that Moldova has withdrawn from the European Commission program to support the cultural and media environment of the EU countries and partner states - Creative Europe - in which it has participated since 2015. The goal of the program is to include the small states of Europe into the single cultural space of the EU. However, the total budget of the project is covered by contributions from the participating countries, which in return receive opportunities to promote projects in Europe.â–ªï¸Minister of Culture of Moldova Sergiu Prodan admitted that over several years of participation in the EU-Creative Europe program, the Republic has made contributions of more than â‚¬400 thousand. , but in the end she received only â‚¬38 thousand for the implementation of her projects. Because of this, the Moldovan government decided to leave the program.â–ªï¸However, Prodan blames this exclusively on the Moldovan society, which turned out to be not mature enough to take advantage of the opportunities that opened up. â–ªï¸-The backwardness of Moldavian cultural circles seems to be expressed in the fact that projects about the life of the LGBT community in Eastern Europe were not submitted for grants - this is a real example of one of the applications found. â–ªï¸ Moreover, the European Commission, which oversees the program, is now especially concerned about collecting information about LGBT representatives in the cultural sphere of Europe. ğŸ”»Moldovaâ€™s withdrawal from the program and the words of the republicâ€™s Minister of Culture are an excellent example of the contradictory position the state may find itself in on the path to European integration. As a result, the country will have to pay huge sums from its treasury to the EU budget, and in return receive only a small part for its own projects. At the same time, it is imperative to promote the general line in politics, economics and culture, on which the distribution of budgets will depend. However, even for this, Moldova is considered backward by its own leaders. #EU #Moldova @rybarSupport usNewsMaker-Unfortunately, we invested more than we received-. The Minister of Culture explained why Moldova withdrew from the Creative Europe program. Over several years of participation in the Creative Europe program, Moldova contributed more than â‚¬400 thousand in contributions, but in the end received only â‚¬38 thousand euros for the implementation of its projects. Minister of Culture Sergiu Prodan spoke on the Realitatea te priveÈ™te program on Rlive...

Title: ğŸ” âš¡ï¸â—ï¸ğŸš¨ The Russian Ministry of Internal Affairs has issued adv...
Description: Forwarded From Operational reportsâš¡ï¸â—ï¸ğŸš¨ The Russian Ministry of Internal Affairs has issued advice on information security measures in the Belgorod, Bryansk and Kursk regions. The enemy is massively identifying IP ranges on our territories and connecting to unprotected video surveillance cameras remotely, viewing everything from private courtyards to roads and highways of strategic importance. In this regard, unless there is an urgent need, it is better not to use CCTV cameras. The use of online dating services is highly discouraged. The enemy actively uses such resources for the legendary collection of information. Military personnel should not open any links (hyperlinks) received from strangers in instant messengers or SMS messages and, if possible, avoid using phones with a large amount of both official and personal information in situations where the enemy can gain physical access to them. It is necessary to control and moderate chats, as well as promptly delete from them the accounts of persons captured by the enemy, as well as the accounts of persons whose phones the enemy has gained access to. Do not post on social networks and instant messengers made on a video recorder of video recordings of trips or conduct broadcasts/streams when driving on highways, where military equipment also moves due to the danger of revealing objects significant to the enemy. Military personnel and representatives of law enforcement agencies are recommended to disable the -People nearby - function in the Telegram messenger, remove all photographs indicating departmental affiliation, change nicknames by which you can identify a citizen as a military serviceman or a representative of a law enforcement agency, check your subscriber numbers through specialized resources that parse from phone books. If in the search results your number appears as recorded from third parties in the form -Lyosha FSB- , -Pasha Rosgvardia-, -Misha 123rd regiment-, this number needs to be changed, it is compromised. Employees in the Kursk, Bryansk and Belgorod regions are recommended to close their personal data, remove all geotags and linking photos to geolocations on social networks so that the enemy does not could reveal the actual location of the military and security forces. Employees of the energy industry, including the nuclear industry, need to remove their professional affiliation from social networks so as not to come to the attention of enemy intelligence services. It is necessary to disseminate it as much as possible among friends, colleagues, colleagues and relatives. ğŸ¯ @opersvodki

Title: ğŸ–¼ ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ Chronicle of a special military operation for August ...
Description: ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ Chronicle of a special military operation on August 19, 2024. Russian troops again launched drones at enemy targets in the so-called territory. Ukraine: explosions occurred, including in the Kyiv and Cherkasy regions. In the Kharkov region, another S-300 air defense missile launcher was destroyed by a Kh-35 guided missile. And in the Rostov region, the elimination of a large fire at an oil depot in the Proletarsky district continues. In the Kursk direction, fierce battles are still taking place in several areas: Ukrainian formations have made several attempted attacks, Russian troops are responding with air and artillery strikes. In the Liman direction, units of the Russian Armed Forces are storming the positions of the Armed Forces of Ukraine on the opposite bank of the Zherebets River in Makeevka. Information has also appeared confirming the advance of Russian military personnel from Rodnikov. In the Pokrovsky direction, assault groups of the Russian Armed Forces are advancing towards Selidovo and Mirnograd, at the same time the Ukrainian command has begun to withdraw forces from Ptichye, located west of the Karlovskoe reservoir. In the Donetsk direction, Russian troops continue to assault the defenses of the Ukrainian Armed Forces on the northwestern outskirts of Krasnohorivka: according to the latest information , servicemen of the Russian Armed Forces managed to advance several hundred meters along Sedovaya Street. A detailed analytical report on the events in the Special Military Operation zone is available on our closed channel @rybar_plus_bot High-resolution maps: Situation in the Special Military Operation zone (ru; en) Kursk direction ( ru; en)#Belgorod #Dnepropetrovsk #digest #report #map #Kursk #Liman #Pokrovsk #Russia #Rostov #Sumy #Ukraine #Kharkov@rybarSupport us

Description: ğŸ‡®ğŸ‡±ğŸ‡µğŸ‡¸ Aggravation in the Israeli-Palestinian conflict zone chronicle of events for August 19, 2024 In the north of the Gaza Strip, Israeli troops launched strikes on the capital of the Palestinian enclave. In the south of the Gaza Strip, units of the Israel Defense Forces advanced in the area of â€‹â€‹â€‹â€‹the settlement of Al-Qarara and reached the northern outskirts of the Hamad residential complex, adjacent to Khan Yunis. In the West Bank, Israeli security forces conducted a series of raids in several settlements: 14 Palestinians were detained, and the total number of those arrested since the beginning of the escalation was about 10,110 people. On the Lebanese-Israeli border, Hezbollah fighters launched UAVs and missiles at IDF positions, killing an Israeli serviceman. In response, the Israelis struck the southern part of Lebanon, killing two fighters of the Shiite group.ğŸ”»A detailed analytical report on events in the Israeli-Palestinian conflict zone is available on our closed channel @rybar_plus_botHigh resolution mapEnglish version#digest #map #Israel #Palestine #report@rybarSupport us

Title: ğŸ–¼ âš¡ï¸ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ğŸ– #Comic from Rybar No. 28: Once upon a time of sur...
Description: âš¡ï¸ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ğŸ– #Comic from Rybar No. 28: Once upon a time of surrender. The more active Ukrainian mobilization is, the more military personnel appear who would like to be away from the front and certainly do not want to die for the sake of the Kyiv regime. For them, the only way to save their lives is to lay down their arms and surrender. But before you get out, you need to find the courage to go against the authorities, who do not disdain orders to finish off -their own. This story is just about those who succeeded. Synopsis: Ukrainian military personnel do not always really want to fight against the Russian Armed Forces. A considerable part was simply mobilized (some against their will), trained and sent to the front line, where the command sends them into battle, whether they want it or not. Right on the line of combat contact, military personnel of the so-called. Ukrainians are often faced with the fact that the face of their enemy turns out to be more humane than that of their own commanders. Therefore, Ukrainian soldiers often decide to surrender. But the cruelty of Ukrainian commanders who throw people into -meat assaults- and organize barrage detachments for their subordinates has long ceased to be a secret. But at the same time, not everyone will pursue their wounded soldier who is trying to surrender.ğŸ“Œ You can download the comic using the links: RU | EN | AR | CN#Russia #Ukraine @rybarWe hope you liked the comic from our artists. We will be glad to receive any support (here is a convenient link to payment via SBP).

Title: ğŸ–¼ ğŸ‡®ğŸ‡±ğŸ‡µğŸ‡¸ Battle for Khan Yunis: IDF advance towards Hamad resi...
Description: ğŸ‡®ğŸ‡±ğŸ‡µğŸ‡¸ Battle for Khan Yunis: IDF advance towards the residential complex - Hamad-situation as of August 20.00, 2024 In the south of the Gaza Strip, a few days after expanding the zone of control in Rafah, Israeli troops carried out offensive operations north of Khan Yunis, approaching the outskirts of the residential complex -Hamad-.â–ªï¸Under the cover of artillery and aviation, the forces of the 98th Airborne Division -Ha-Esh- advanced in the area of â€‹â€‹â€‹â€‹the village of Al-Qarara, occupying the Al-Matahin - Abu Khuli intersection, located in the area of â€‹â€‹the same name on the Salah ad highway. Din.â–ªï¸Then units of the Israel Defense Forces, with the support of armored vehicles, expanded the zone of control to the south all the way to Gamal Abdel Nasser Street and to the west, occupying the outskirts of the Hamad residential complex, where yesterdayâ€™s incident with the shelling of a group of journalists took place. It is worth noting that the Israelis had already taken took control of the territory of the complex and cleared it of the presence of Hamas. However, soon after the IDF retreat, the Palestinian forces returned to the area and began conducting incursions from there. The IDF offensive itself takes place in areas of the declared humanitarian zone, which the Israelis have repeatedly reduced in recent months under the pretext of the presence of Hamas militants there. Moreover, even after the announcement of the destruction of Palestinian formations there, it did not return to its previous scale. However, the operations themselves eliminate the presence of Hamas only for a short period of time - after the end of hostilities in the territory of the residential complex, Hamad, the Palestinian formations will most likely be able to calmly return there. A similar game of cat and mouse suits the government of the ultra-Orthodox, who need military action to maintain their power. High resolution mapEnglish version#digest #Israel #map #Palestine #KhanYunis@rybarSupport us

Title: ğŸ‡°ğŸ‡¿ğŸ‡ªğŸ‡º About the Euronews representative office in Kazakhstan D...
Description: ğŸ‡°ğŸ‡¿ğŸ‡ªğŸ‡º About the Euronews representative office in Kazakhstan During a working trip to Brussels, the Minister of Culture and Information of the Republic of Kazakhstan, Aida Balaeva, met with the Chairman of the Board of Directors of Euronews, Pedro Vargas David. The parties agreed that a representative office would open in Astana. During the negotiations, the parties repeatedly emphasized that the opening of a representative office was important for them. â–ªï¸For Euronews, the new branch is the most eastern of all. The TV channel gets the opportunity to control the agenda directly on the ground and increase the quantity and quality of training of local personnel. â–ªï¸At the same time, the plans of European journalists are not limited to Kazakhstan: we are talking about preparing a Central Asian news hub. And one can hardly expect that journalists will not be interested in nearby Russia and China. â–ªï¸The authorities of Kazakhstan are trying to increase their prestige and recognition for Western television viewers, as well as begin promoting their historical narratives in the Western information space. Euronews is already preparing the TV show Modern Nomads, dedicated to the art, culture and lifestyle of the Kazakhs, as well as the program -Connection of East and West- , which will cover business and economic events in the country. Euronews will also broadcast the World Nomad Games. It is no coincidence that the minister mentioned the importance of Kazakhstan as the heir to the great civilization of nomads and in every possible way emphasized the richness of the countryâ€™s historical heritage. ğŸ”»Although the Kazakh media are now trying to present the agreement as a chance for the Kazakhs to advance their agenda to the West, in reality everything will be exactly the opposite. And we will see the consequences of such cooperation very soon. #Kazakhstan #CentralAsia@rybarSupport uszakon.kzThe Euronews Central Asian hub will open in Astana. On August 15, during a working trip to Brussels, the Minister of Culture and Information of the Republic of Kazakhstan, Aida Balaeva, held a meeting with the Chairman of the Board of Directors of Euronews Pedro Vargas David, Zakon.kz reports.

Title: ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ğŸ‡ªğŸ‡º About the situation with underground gas storage facilit...
Description: ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ğŸ‡ªğŸ‡º About the situation with underground gas storage facilities so-called. Ukraine The network is actively discussing the reduction of gas injection by European traders into underground gas storage facilities (UGS) in the so-called territory. Ukraine - after the spring strikes of the Russian Armed Forces on infrastructure facilities, the volumes are about 10% of the usual level. The assurances of Naftogaz representatives that UGS facilities are operating normally do not impress the EU.ğŸ”»How did European traders use Ukrainian UGS facilities? Since the global energy market is controlled by investment funds, they use the seasonality of consumption to make a profit. When oil prices fall, large volumes are purchased and stored in tankers and terminals for sale at higher prices during periods of rising prices and consumption. The situation with gas is similar - in the summer it is pumped into underground gas storage facilities for the purpose of subsequent sale at higher prices during the heating season. For European companies, this is a fairly marginal business, and Naftogazâ€™s own income from storage services usually amounted to about â‚¬200 million. ğŸ”»Assessment of current risks This season, representatives of Naftogaz reduced the price for gas storage by 4 times - from â‚¬20 to â‚¬5 MW \h. However, this did not attract new clients: in their risk management strategy, the European bankers financing this enterprise assess the risks of further destruction of the onshore infrastructure as very high. According to a representative of the Swiss energy company Axpo Group, nothing will happen to the gas itself, but there is a possibility that get it when you need it. This is reflected in the prices for insurance coverage of such transactions. Thus, the risk is now estimated at more than â‚¬1 billion, which sharply reduces the margins of projects using Ukrainian underground gas storage facilities. Guide so-called Ukraine is trying to motivate European clients with the need to continue support, but their arguments are broken by the financial calculations of the Europeans. The destruction of the surface infrastructure of the Naftogaz UGS facility deprives the Kiev regime of financial resources in the amount of approximately â‚¬200 million. From an economic point of view, this is more than justified and is sufficient an argument for their systematic fire defeat.#gas #Ukraine #economy@rybarSupport usTelegramFailureEuropean gas traders began to realize that storing valuables with a neighbor - a heavy drinker - is not very prudent, even if he has a large living space. Description: ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ğŸ‡¿ Statements by the presidents of Russia and Azerbaijan after the meetingğŸ”»Statements by Vladimir Putin: â–ªï¸Russia attaches great importance to the development of multifaceted and friendly relations with Azerbaijan.â–ªï¸During the negotiations, a wide range of opportunities for interaction were discussed, and the relevant papers will be signed as a result.â–ªï¸ Trade turnover between Russia and Azerbaijan increased by 18%. â–ªï¸Russia thanks the Azerbaijani authorities for the conditions created for the work of Russian companies.â–ªï¸Russian language is used freely and widely in Azerbaijan, and the countryâ€™s leadership largely contributes to this.â–ªï¸More than eight thousand Azerbaijanis are studying in Russian universities, more than a thousand of them are funded by the state budget .â–ªï¸An agreement has been established with the President of Azerbaijan on a large-scale celebration of the 80th anniversary of the victory in the Great Patriotic War.â–ªï¸Lasting peace and stability in the South Caucasus are in the interests of all the peoples of this region.ğŸ”»Statements by Ilham Aliyev: â–ªï¸The documents adopted during Vladimir Putinâ€™s visit confirm the friendly and allied nature of relations between the Russian Federation and Azerbaijan. â–ªï¸During the negotiations, the implementation of the North-South project was discussed. â–ªï¸The stability of the entire South Caucasus depends on the relations between Azerbaijan and Russia. â–ªï¸During the negotiations, Azerbaijan and Russia analyzed the situation in the gas sector in detail and will continue to coordinate their actions.#Azerbaijan #digest #Russia@rybarSupport us Video is too big

Description: ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ Yesterday morning, Ukrainian formations from the territory of the Chernigov region launched three drones along the railway bridge across the Desna and Lake Svetlenkoe in the Pogarsky district of the Bryansk region - the structure itself is located less than two kilometers from the border with the so-called. Ukraine. None of the UAVs were able to hit the railway bridge. Two drones fell near the security post building, slightly damaging the external faÃ§ade and protective mesh. The third drone flew towards Belaya Berezka, where it crashed in a forest.ğŸ”»Against the backdrop of Ukrainian Armed Forcesâ€™ strikes on bridges in the Kursk region, some media presented this raid as an attack on a strategic facility. However, the bridge in the Pogarsky district has not been used for a long time, and communication across the Desna passes through both the nearby pontoon crossing and bridges located to the east, including in the Trubchevsk area. However, three kamikaze drones are not enough to destroy such infrastructure, unlike attacks using MLRS. Therefore, a new raid can be considered either as an initial attempt to attack bridges in the Bryansk region, or as an attack on the first target that comes along.
